programme.title: Ready Jet Go! - EP 0051 & 0052
programme.desc: Ready Jet Go! follows two neighborhood kids: Sean, who has an all-consuming drive for science facts, and Sydney, who has a passion for science fiction and imagination. They both befriend the new kid on their street, Jet Propulsion, whose family members happen to be aliens! Together, they embark on great adventures, exploring the solar system, learning about space and science, but always back just in time for dinner!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S3 - EP 20
programme.desc: Make a splash with the third swim-sational season of Bubble Guppies! Join them as they discover all kinds of animals, from Australia to the Arctic, from dolphins to elephants, from bullfrogs and bees to a Bubble Kitty!

programme.title: Everyday Gourmet With Justine Schofield S6 - EP 3
programme.desc: Hosted by popular series one MasterChef contestant, Justine Schofield. Everyday Gourmet presents can-do cooking ideas as well as tips, tricks and insights into making us all more confident in the kitchen. Justine believes when it comes to cooking, a little bit of confidence goes a long way, and shell spend most of the time building up your confidence in the kitchen.

programme.title: Martha Bakes S6 - EP 3
programme.desc: Martha shares her best tips and techniques with viewers, giving them the confidence to create the finest desserts and delectable baked goods in their own kitchens. From Martha's favourite breakfast recipes to puddings and cookies, Martha's updated versions of the classics will set the standard.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune 36 - EP 6964
programme.desc: (Encore) Wheel Of Fortune is an American television game show created by Merv Griffin. The show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.desc: Adina learns some harsh truths about long-term dementia sufferers and its effects on their caregivers. Ah Yoke believes Derek and Jessica want to turn her into a new and improved version of Ella. Emily is shocked to find out that she is to work on a project with Ah Hock.

The food he brought this time is no exception. (重)一对夫妻长时间生活在一起，除了互相忍耐、包容，相濡以沫外，了解彼此的不同和需要，尽量满足对方的需求也是必不可少的。一起来听听嘉宾叶世品、洪慧芳、陈天文和他们另一半之间的点点滴滴。名厨曹勇每次到访都让嘉宾和主持人赞不绝口，这次他带来的料理也不例外，一起来学做这道”潮州蒸红斑“。.

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong announced the increase in retirement and re-employment age of workers in Singapore during his National Day Rally speech. What are the responses from older workers and how will small and medium sized companies be affected? What can be done to ensure that these older workers stay relevant to the changing needs of the workforce? The Government will also increase bursary subsidies to make tertiary education even more affordable for lower and middle-income families. (重)李显龙总理在国庆群众大会上宣布提高退休和重新雇佣年龄。年长员工对此有什么看法？中小型企业会如何受到影响？要怎么确保年长工友能够与时并进，满足劳动队伍未来的需求？此外，政府也将大幅提高助学金来补贴大专学费，帮助中低收入家庭的孩子负担得起良好的大专教育。这些家庭能如何受惠？.

(重)大厨在酒店餐馆指挥若定，率领团队烹煮一道道的山珍海味，但是听说他们因为工作太忙碌了，在家都几乎不下厨！那他们off day 又会做什么呢？这个全新的大厨烹饪节目以此为出发点，每集由其中两位主持人趁大厨off day，到他们的家进行突击，看看他们在毫无准备的情况下如何临危不乱，巧用家里有限的食材，即兴煮出一桌简单又美味的家常菜！.

Jinny, Danny and Toto team up and their adventure to capture Grey begins. 从魔法世界逃出来的坏蛋格雷，踏上了嚣张的艺术品破坏之路。为了逮捕他，小魔法师金妮和她的助手小猫托托从魔法世界来到人类世界。但是，在追捕的过程中，不懂艺术品的金妮有些毫无头绪，好在她得到了热爱艺术的男孩丹尼的帮助。他们成功地将格雷毁坏的艺术品一一恢复原样。.

programme.title: 小城花样多 Small Town Surprises - EP 9
programme.desc: This week, Sugie and the Koh family uncovers the secret reason why bean sprouts in Ipoh are extra fat and juicy. Our Koh siblings also learn to package kacang putih just like the good old days during their parents' time! Watch and play along as our Koh family struggle to differentiate and identify our endearing orangutans from The Orangutan Island! 怡保著名的芽菜为什么比新加坡的豆芽更鲜甜肥美？这一期的《小城花样多》，Sugie 和高家来到了怡保发掘种植芽菜的秘诀！高家兄妹俩还尝试以爸爸妈妈熟悉的复古式包法来包装 kacang putih！最后，高家在怡保独特的人猿岛展开了紧张刺激的寻找人猿大比拼！.

边城故事 Borders - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) This documentary will have a series presenter who will travel to these cross border towns to understand, learn and unveil the realities of the hard life in these regions. (重)由谢韵仪主持，带领观众探索全世界6个边境，13个边城。希望观众收看《边城故事》能对边城的灰色地带课题有所启发，同时也能感受到，两地的边城子民其实可以在求同存异的基础上，和平共处。.

Casts: Tay Ping Hui as Li Tian Ming; Terence Cao as Jin Yong Cheng; Andie Chen as Xu Hao Long; Zhang Zhenhuan as Ye Zhi Bin. (PG)(重)四个从牢中走出来的男人，各自面对不同的人生道路。演员:郑斌辉饰黎天明;曹国辉饰金勇诚;陈邦鋆饰徐浩龙;张振寰饰叶志斌.

programme.title: 周公找茶 Dennis Uncovers - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) When Dennis - our well-known Radio DJ cum comedian - invites his celebrity friends over for "kopi", expect a no-holds-barred conversation. As the caffeine takes effect, Dennis works on uncovering secrets from his guests. His guest celebrities are not just restricted to famous personalities in show-business, they include among others successful people from the world of sports, arts and fashion. Set in a cafe where cameras are almost not in sight, recording starts the moment Dennis steps in. (重)登上鸟巢、一夜成名的董姿彦，却担心人气下滑？.

programme.title: 古早味侦探 Old Taste Detective - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Laksa, a dish which is originated in Nanyang, has different variations in taste and cooking among different ethnic groups and regions. In this episode, Yi Feng and Chef Ivan try to revisit and recreate the old taste of Nonya laksa and also to reveal the hearsay of using earth worms as an ingredient. (重)叻沙是一道起源于南洋的面食料理，而不同族群和地方都有不同的口味和做法。本集节目中，主持人怡凤和杨应晖师傅除了找出古早味娘惹叻沙的用料和做法，也试图破解叻沙加入蚯蚓为配料的传闻。.

programme.title: 甜味。艺术 A Sweet Taste Of Art - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Italian cuisine is well-known around the world, especially during the Renaissance when a lot of desserts are invented. Desserts in each region are unique and Florence, which is the origin of the Renaissance, is also the birthplace of many classic desserts. Italy will not be perfect without desserts. (重)意大利的菜肴举世闻名，特别是文艺复兴时期，发明了不少甜点，各个区域的甜点都各有特色。其中位在中部的佛罗伦萨，是文艺复兴的起源地，更是许多经典甜点的发源地。没有甜点的意大利是不圆满的。.

programme.title: 大英雄 Hero - EP 0001 & 0002
programme.desc: (R) Zhou Fa Da, also known as "Big Brother", is an idle man who does not play by the rules. He always bicker with his uncle, Xiao Ying. Together with Wei Xiong, who studies law, the three self-proclaim to be the "Hero" of Dakota. Big Brother's grandmother is a tough lady, yet she feels helpless in front of her good-for-nothing nephew and son. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)住在达哥打弯的周发达外号大哥大，是个游手好闲、行事说话不按牌理出牌的年轻人，与堂叔晓英总是互相抬杠，没有辈分之别；伟雄则是法律系女生，三人自称是达哥打弯的"大英雄"。大哥大的阿嬷身强体壮，有侠女之风，却对叔侄俩的没出息感到生气又无奈。.

programme.title: 发现大丝路IV Discover The Great Silk Road Season 4 - EP 11
programme.desc: "Discover The Great Silk Road" is a large-scale travelogue spanning the three continents of Europe, Asia and Africa. Follow the host Marco Liao as he starts his breath-taking journey from China's Xi'an through the Northern Silk Road to the path taken by Admiral Zheng He. 发现大丝路是一个横跨欧亚非三大洲的大型文化旅游节目，主持人廖科溢从中国西安出发，走过充满伊斯兰风情的北方丝路，穿越蜀身毒道，看见南方丝路文化，最后寻郑和下西洋的路线见证海上丝路的辉煌。.

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Frontline is a weekly investigative current affairs programme that aims to address issues closest to the hearts of Singaporeans. (重)民情、民生、民意！【前线追踪】紧跟社会民生步伐，追踪调查时事动态，探讨新加坡人关心的课题，针对问题的核心追根究底。.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 0051 & 0052
programme.desc: (R) Apart from approving her daughter's marriage with Liu Bei, Guo Tai also tries to match-make Zhao Zilong and Gongsun Baoyue. But Zilong insists that he will not consider marriage before helping Liu Bei to rebuild Han Dynasty. (PG)(重)除了允诺女儿和刘备的婚事，国太还试图撮合赵子龙与公孙宝月。但子龙坚持要待协助刘备复兴汉室之后，方才谈论婚事。.

programme.title: 双子星 The Ultimatum - EP 0007 & 0008
programme.desc: (R) Zheng Wen Yu was pregnant when she was taken advantage of by her boss Ye Song Nian, the CEO of Phoenix Corporation. Both Wen Yu and Song Nian's wife gave birth to daughters in the same hospital. As fate will have it, the hospital made a mistake and swapped the babies. Because Wen Yu's daughter was diagnosed with congenital heart disease, she kept silent about the mistake so that her daughter can receive the best medical care with Song Nian's wealth. (重)三十多年前，凤凰集团老板叶松年强暴了原已怀孕的郑文玉，满心怨恨的文玉遂故意让自己和对方二姨太同时出世的女儿－叶予晨、方宋乔身份对调。宋乔在文玉泄恨打骂之下，度过悲苦的童年；予晨长大后则在凤凰集团身居要职。.

programme.title: 那年花开月正圆 Nothing Gold Can Stay - EP 0067 & 0068
programme.desc: (R) Shen Xingyi decides to go elsewhere to build even more modern schools as he believes that only good education can save a declining China. Meantime, Emperor Guang Xu is placed under house arrest by order of Empress Dowager Ci Xi for advocating changes in the systems. (PG)(重)沈星移决定再到另外一个地方，建立更多的现代学堂，因为他相信，唯有教育才能救得了，日渐衰败的中国。与此同时，主张变法维新的光绪皇帝，遭掌握实权的慈禧太后软禁。.

programme.title: 玩家万岁 Home Makeover - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) In this hilarious and entertaining home renovation program, join Mark Lee, Kym Ng, and Ben Yeo as they aspire to give a makeover to homes, and bring joy to the homeowners' faces. (重)《玩家万岁》由李国煌、钟琴和杨志龙主持，每集到访不同的家庭，为他们重新打造理想的住家。过程中也会分享许多室内设计与装潢的贴士及好去处。.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 一座山一条河 Tuesday Report - A Hill and A River - EP 1

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 新加坡篇 All Is Well - Singapore - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Uncle Yang breaks into Ming Jie's house, and forges a suicide note for Ming Jie's death, but police officer Jia Xin does not believe that Ming Jie will commit suicide. Xiao Ai joins an advertising company that is responsible for Hao Sen's company's advertisements. Both of them interact often and grow closer. A video that Zhi Ling recorded to wish her son Xiao Ji happy birthday is uploaded online. Jia Xin tracks the source of the video, and finds out that it was sent from April's phone. (PG-些许毒品相关内容)(重)杨叔潜入明捷住处，伪造明捷自杀遗书，但警察佳欣不信明捷会自杀。筱艾加入广告公司，负责豪森公司广告企划，两人因接触而感情升温。网络上传出芝玲为小吉录的生日视频，佳欣追查来源，发现是来自另一陪酒女郎April的手机，但April已出境去台湾。.

programme.title: 晨光第一线 Morning Express - EP 111
programme.desc: (Live) A daily brand new News belt, from Monday to Friday, 9am - 9.30am. （现场直播）全新新闻时段，每逢星期一至五，早上九点，准时送上。.

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 68
programme.desc: (R) Uncle Lottery's children profusely take action by pretending that they are pitiful and poor to borrow money from Uncle Lottery. Ping Pong reminds Uncle Lottery not to be soft hearted, and decides to bring him home to stay. Uncle Lottery wants to secretly take out his money to help his children, but Ping Pong realises that his lie to Uncle Lottery is about to be exposed...... (PG)(重)马票叔的孩子纷纷开始行动，装惨扮穷要跟马票叔借钱，Ping Pong劝马票叔不要心软，还把他接回家住。马票叔想要偷偷拿钱出来帮忙孩子，Ping Pong眼看没中马票的事就要被揭穿……。.

programme.title: 食尚口袋名單 Gourmet Guides - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Discover sumptuous cuisine in major cities as you get on the food trail, liberally sprinkled with a new list of highly-recommended restaurants. (重)一起去搜寻食尚潮人经常打卡光顾的主题餐厅，让你在结合创意与食尚的舒适空间中尽享美食。店家除了介绍餐厅主题和招牌菜色，也会与你分享食谱.

programme.title: 夜市人生 Night Market Life a.k.a. Life - EP 0996 & 0997
programme.desc: (R) Cai Yuexia operates a stall at a night market while her husband, Qingxiang, works in the Mainland. Their family falls apart when Qingxiang sets up another family outside. Yuexia struggles to bring up her children with the help of the head of the night market - Jiang Yiguan. (PG)(重)在夜市卖药炖排骨的蔡月霞与经商的丈夫李庆祥育有一对子女。原本幸福的家庭却因庆祥在外有另一名女人而被摧毁。月霞辛苦地抚养子女，幸有夜市老大江一官在旁扶持，但月霞的女儿友慧却不支持两人的关系。.

programme.title: 小毛病,大问题 2 Body SOS 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Star Awards 2013 Best Variety Programme winner makes it return with more relatable topics pertaining to health with its panel of experts and celebrity guests. Mark Lee and Lee Teng host this award winning show. (重)红星大奖2013 最佳综艺节目赢家以第二系列的姿态带给观众更贴切的健康课题。主持人李国煌与李腾将一起同专家及嘉宾艺人一起钻研探讨各种保健疑问.

programme.title: 118 118 - EP 234
programme.desc: (R) Chou Xiao Zi remains devoted to Jin Zhi. She is afraid of him, and is obviously happy when she sees Xiao Bao. Ah Niang analyses that this manifested because Jin Zhi feels inferior to Chou Xiao Zi in her subconscious. (PG)(重)臭小子对金枝一往情深，金枝却说害怕臭小子，看见小宝却明显开心不已，臭小子不禁感到失落。阿娘分析，说金枝潜意识里可能觉得自己配不上臭小子，才会有这种恐惧感。.

programme.title: 我的小小美猴王 My Little Monkey King - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Little Monkey King wants to become the Great Monkey King, so he went out to acquire skills. On the way, in order to avoid the puppy, he transformed himself into a doll. Dabaos father bought him home, to live with their family. (重)小小美猴王要成为真正的美猴王 ,还需要学习许许多多的本领，于是他外出学艺。在途中为了躲避小狗，他变成一个布娃娃，被大宝爸爸买回家，与他们全家人生活在一起。.

programme.title: 芈月传 The Legend Of Miyue - EP 66
programme.desc: (R) Though suffering from excruciating pain, Miyue refuses to reveal the whereabouts of the late Emperor Qin's last written decree to Wei Yan and Empress Wu. Instead, Miyue gives the written decree to eunuch Mu Xin and asks him to seek help when he visits her unexpectedly. (PG)(重)虽然痛苦难当，芈月仍然咬住牙根，不肯说出遗诏的下落，令魏琰和武后，一时也奈何她不得。就在这时候，穆辛突然出现在芈月眼前。芈月于是将遗诏交给穆辛，嘱咐他向魏冉，庸芮与义渠王求助。.

programme.title: 1/2 缘分 You Are The One - EP 13
甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 210
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 天之骄子 Gifted - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Qi Kang cracks the case and becomes famous. His father, Zhao Dong Tian, feels proud. However, this was all engineered by Dong Tian as Qi Kang does not actually have the skills to succeed. Turns out, Xiao Yi was the one working behind the scenes to help him. De Zhi's wife died young. He sympathises with Ling Li and tries to support her as much as he can. Ling Li's son is autistic and her husband, Tian Qiang, has gone missing for years. (重)启康抢先一步破案，声名大噪，其父赵洞天非常得意。其实这一切都是洞天安排的骗局，而启康并无特殊能力，破案全靠孝义在幕后协助。得志妻子早逝，他因同情伶俐而给予她各方面的帮忙。伶俐的儿子是名自闭儿，丈夫添强则失踪多年，生活面对压力，不禁对得志产生依赖和爱慕。.

programme.title: 我是媒体人 Beyond the Cameras - EP 2
programme.desc: The two trainees - Yeu Her and Kano got a great learning opportunity at the outdoor shoot of "Star Awards 2019". It was however, not quite what they have imagined it to be, why? The trainees moved on to the filming scene of variety show "Ah Gong Can Cook" next, where they observed the professionals at work. What have they learnt? Doing a vox pop, finding appropriate props, and the various tasks being thrown at them one after another. Can they cope till the end? Stay tuned! 两位综艺助理编导练习生- 雨荷和妤庭难得碰上《红星大奖2019》的外景拍摄，并有幸参与其中，但这次的外景拍摄却跟她们想象的不一样，为什么？值得一提的是，主持人的专业和投入态度竟让她们看傻了眼！接着，她们还到《阿公来做饭》的拍摄现场观摩，她们学习到了什么？街头访问、找道具，各种挑战接踵而来，她们能坚持到最后吗？请继续锁定！.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 新加坡篇 All Is Well - Singapore - EP 6
programme.desc: Hao Sen asks Linda for the backstory on the relationship between his brother Yao Sen and Long Hang. Linda reveals that it is actually Yan Feng, the Vice President, who first started working together with Long Hang. As the Wu family has ties with the underworld, Yao Sen has repeatedly clashed with Yan Feng over this. Subsequently, Li Hao decides to bid for the project when Pin Rui forcefully steps into his turf. (PG-部分画面令人不安)豪森向Linda探听哥哥耀森和龙航之间如何开始合作，Linda透露其实是副总裁延丰先开始和龙航合作。因吴家是黑道背景，耀森为了这件事，多次和延丰起冲突。后来品睿占了李昊的地盘，所以李昊才会来抢标案。.

programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 诡探 Detective Psycho - EP 23
programme.desc: The poisonous gas attack suspect dies in the police station. A considerable amount of hallucinogen is found in her body during the autopsy. Pastor Bai suspects that a cult is plotting a second attack. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)毒气事件的嫌疑犯在警局断气后，体内被验出有大量的半人工迷幻剂。白神父怀疑邪教在策划第二次袭击。.

programme.title: Fresh!新登场 – 佩佩 Fresh Takes - Pei Pei
programme.desc: (R) "Fresh Takes" is a series of 10 local short films directed and produced by Mediacorp artistes Bryan Wong, Romeo Tan, Shane Pow, Priscelia Chan, Joanne Peh and Ian Fang, as well as production teams from Mediacorp Chinese Drama, Studiomonki, Wawa Pictures and August Pictures. (PG)(重)一位深藏在记忆中的女儿，明明是最亲的人，却无法释出关心的一面。女儿的心永远漂浮不定，思念着家乡却没有勇气回到父亲身旁了。佩佩离开乌敏岛到新加坡独自生活，认识了性感美女Tracy和豪爽帅气的阿哲三人成为好朋友。在两人的影响下，佩佩靠自己的才华慢慢成为网红。一段裸露影片在网络中流传，三人的关系进而发生巨大的变化。正寿等不到回家吃饭的女儿，决定与女儿的好友阿健一起到新加坡寻找佩佩，才发现记忆中最亲近的女儿已经不是自己想象中的样子，女儿在新加坡遭遇的事情成为父亲心里最痛的那根刺。最后，父亲决定回到家乡，等待女儿回来，然而佩佩是否会回到父亲的身边呢？.

programme.title: 百味人生 Food Of Life - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Life and death is a natural cycle of life. People pay last respect to the deceased and express their loss through funeral rituals. Funeral is the most serious event in life and each ethnic groups has their own unique funeral customs and food culture. Food brings the people closer in mourning period. (重)(最后一集)生死循环，生命的自然定律。人们借着丧礼给离世的人最后的敬礼。丧礼是人生中最为严肃的礼仪，让亲友表达对死者的思念。各民族都有其独特的丧葬文化，丧葬活动有饮食文化的介入，同吃共食拉近了人们的心理距离。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 29
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong instructs Mr Huang to release the jackets at low prices, leading franchisees to ask KP Group for an explanation. KP Group faces its greatest crisis since the start of its operations. Xiantai is arrested for dereliction of duty. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)载永指使冒牌社长将之前到手的外套以低价抛出市面，令总公司难以向加盟店的社长们交待。 KP集团面临创业以来最大的危机。贤泰以渎职罪被KP集团提告。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Enzai's father requests Guo Xian to forge his medical report in order to claim his insurance. Enzai overheard and reprimanded her father. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在的父亲叫郭贤在他的医诊报告上作假，好让他领到保险金，此时恩在听到了出言阻止。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 15
programme.desc: Xiuya goes for a makeover in an attempt to forget Zhitai. Her new look attracts the attention of a lawyer, but Xiuya dismisses him as she is constantly reminded of Zhitai. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)秀雅为了忘了知泰，到美容院改头换面一番，成功被一名帅气的律师搭讪，却因为想到知泰而拒绝律师的追求。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 16
programme.desc: Mingxi goes to an art gallery with a group of socialites. One of them reveals that Mingxi has found her long-lost daughter. Mingxi has no choice but to ask Zhi-an to show up at the art gallery when the socialites demand to see her. Zhi-an impresses everyone with her art knowledge. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙与太太们一起到美术馆赏画，出乎意料地被一位名媛揭穿她已经找到女儿的事。太太们要求与知安见面，明熙骑虎难下，要知安立刻出席聚会。知安以出色的美术知识令在场的太太们对她刮目相看。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 1
programme.desc: Literature often contains a rich archive of culture and history. Shanghainese cuisine has become integral to the city's culture. Host Danny Yeo explores renowned Shanghainese writer Zhang Ailing's novels, and discovers the old city's legacy and traditional flavours. 'A Literary Feast' features delectable dishes from renowned literary novels, and explores the hidden stories behind each dish. Discover the art of cuisine behind the traditional flavours of these impeccable legendary dishes. (首播)文学是文化的保存，历史的记载。上海美食从古流传至今，已经不再纯粹是为了填饱肚子的粮食, 它也成了上海的印记。这一集，主持人杨君伟将遵循上海女作家张爱玲细腻的笔触，用书中的美食去感受旧上海的繁华，体验人生百味。 《笔墨间的飨宴》呈现各地不同名著以及作家笔墨下所描绘的珍馐佳肴。在挑动观众味蕾的同时，探讨各地文学相关美食背后的人文故事与饮食文化，进一步了解吃的艺术。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 2
programme.desc: Eric and Dong Huang unknowingly get involved in an ATM heist after participating in the test. Justin deceives Eric about the program being bought by a security company and they would pay him, putting Eric at ease. Teng Sheng Bank found that the ATM was attacked by hackers and 80 million was "robbed". Vice president Guo Yan Feng ordered the police and media to keep it a secret, however, the news still spread online, and rookie reporter Liu Wei Yun finds out about the incident. (PG)Eric、栋煌因参加测试而卷入提款机盗领案，却不自知。Justin欺骗Eric有关程序已被一资安公司买下，并付款给他，Eric感放心。腾升银行发现提款机被骇客攻击，盗领8千万，副总裁郭延丰下令对警方和媒体保密，然而网路上还是传出风声，被菜鸟记者刘维芸发现。.

programme.desc: (R) Xiuya goes for a makeover in an attempt to forget Zhitai. Her new look attracts the attention of a lawyer, but Xiuya dismisses him as she is constantly reminded of Zhitai. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀雅为了忘了知泰，到美容院改头换面一番，成功被一名帅气的律师搭讪，却因为想到知泰而拒绝律师的追求。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Mingxi goes to an art gallery with a group of socialites. One of them reveals that Mingxi has found her long-lost daughter. Mingxi has no choice but to ask Zhi-an to show up at the art gallery when the socialites demand to see her. Zhi-an impresses everyone with her art knowledge. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)明熙与太太们一起到美术馆赏画，出乎意料地被一位名媛揭穿她已经找到女儿的事。太太们要求与知安见面，明熙骑虎难下，要知安立刻出席聚会。知安以出色的美术知识令在场的太太们对她刮目相看。.

programme.title: 创! (PG) Start Up! - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Jessie presents strong evidence to prove that Graffiti copied Enzo's Application, "Hands". These materials had belonged to Xuan's dad and were in Xuan's possession, stored in her wooden box. Sun Shao found out that Doobie is meeting Jessie, in secret! (PG)(重)Jessie提出有力的证据，证明殷萱的Graffiti的确是抄袭Hand！的。这其中的证据，包括了设计蓝图、专利申请书。殷萱发现这些都是属于殷堂的，全部都是放在木制盒子里的。Graffiti要怎么化险为意？ 孙少发现Doobie与Jessie见面，愕然神色！.

programme.title: 一人行。暖人心 Going Miles, Spreading Smiles - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) It all began in 2007, when Annie came across news articles about the internal conflicts in Myanmar. She felt deeply for the homeless and innocent kids and wanted to lend a helping hand. That was when she decided to make a trip to Myanmar. (重)2007年看了缅甸内战的新闻，得知数以万计的儿童流离失所，义工Annie决定"一人行"，实地探访当地孤儿院，希望尽自己微薄的力量、给予协助。就这样，她展开了她的公益人生，每年6月和12月学校假期时，都会抽空到缅甸举办夏令营，教育孩子英文、手工艺和正确的生活习惯。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 30
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing agrees to marry Zaiyong in exchange for Xiantai's release. Xiantai rushes to ask Xiuqing for an explanation when he receives news of her impending wedding. Xiuqing says she has got tired of him. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿为了让贤泰尽早获释，答应跟载永结婚。贤泰听说秀卿的婚讯，匆匆忙忙地找秀卿问个明白。秀卿表现得很镇定，说跟贤泰在一起很辛苦，之前只是在追求刺激感。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Guo Xian is worried when Yingen gives up her chemo treatment. Yingen warns Enzai to stay away from Guo Xian, however Enzai confronts Yingen for faking illness to win back Guo Xian's love. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)郭贤得知英恩想放弃治疗而担心不已. 英恩向恩在宣言，叫她别再缠着郭贤; 恩在反揭穿英恩用患病的理由欺骗郭贤。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 17
programme.desc: Zhi-an suspects that she is not the real Enshi. She is relieved when Min assures her that her identity has been confirmed by a paternity test. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安怀疑自己不是真正的恩石，但闵部长说已经做过亲子鉴定，知安于是放心不少。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 18
programme.desc: Zhi-an compares an old photo of Enshi with that of the deceased twin and realises that Zhixiu is the real Enshi. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安拿着恩石当年失踪的旧剪报回家跟去世的双胞胎的照片做比对，证实当年失踪的孩子是知秀，不是她。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 3
programme.desc: Two years after a catastrophic earthquake struck Nepal, there are many who continue to live with the repercussions of the seismic disaster. Homes have not been fully rebuilt leaving victims without shelter, and schools are still in the process of being repaired. Host Paul Foster hooks up with his Nepalese friends to undertake a tough, dangerous and exhilarating 14-hour drive up the mountains in a special delivery of masonry that will help rebuild schools. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 3
programme.desc: In this episode, Bjorn meets the driving forces behind Mr Popiah and Health Food Matters, the people who are innovating their food products, all for a specific but growing group of consumers. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All is Well - Taiwan - EP 3
programme.desc: Teng Sheng Bank did not report the case. Wei Yun's cousin, Dong Jie is a police officer. He asked Wei Yun to release the news that Teng Sheng Bank's ATM has been robbed, wanting to use the pressure of public opinion to force the bank to report the case, so that the police is able to commence an official investigation. Wei Yun happily agrees. The Taiwan police officially formed an ATM hacking case team. Eric sees the news reports on the hacking case and has a bad feeling about it. (PG)腾升银行没有报案，维芸的堂哥东杰是警察，要求维芸发布腾升银行提款机被盗领的新闻，欲以舆论压力逼银行报案，让警方有立场立案调查，维芸乐得照做。台湾警方正式成立ATM盗领案专案小组。Eric看见盗领案新闻，感觉大事不妙。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 买卖 Business As Usual - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Can money buy everything? From hair, manure to time, if someone sees its value, anything can be a commodity. "Business As Usual" explores the unique trades of the world, uncovering why they have emerged and revealing how they closely intertwine with societal changes and human nature. (重)母乳是婴儿成长最天然的营养品，而美国是少数可合法售卖母乳的国家，有些母亲通过母乳银行购买母乳，有些母亲则通过网站售卖自己的母乳。为了确保新鲜母乳能被及时运送，一群义务女性骑士自告奋勇帮忙运送，也有妈妈将母乳制成饰品出售。这一集看看美国纽约的母乳买卖如何进行？.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 传说中的料理 II Legendary Cuisines 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Do you know that Genghis Khan must have grilled skewered mutton before he leaves for the battlefield? Or how is the Dowager Chrysanthemum Hot Pot related to Empress Cixi? The new season of Legendary Cuisines has the answers. (重)你尝过鸳鸯鸡粥吗？知道梅兰芳在登台前必吃的心是什么吗？太后菊花锅和慈禧太后有什么关系？新系列的《传说中的料理》将为你解答。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 31
programme.desc: (R) Yijun and Xiantai finally find Mr Huang and also locate a recorded conversation between Mr Huang and Zaiyong in Mr Huang's phone. Xiantai hears from Xiaoxun that Xiuqing agreed to marry Xiantai for the sake of him and Xiaoxun. Xiantai rushes to the wedding venue and brings Xiuqing away. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)益俊和贤泰终于找到黄社长，还在他的电话里听到他与载永的通话录音。载永和秀卿结婚当天，贤泰从小勋的口中听说秀卿是为了他们父子俩才答应嫁给载永的。贤泰赶往婚礼现场抢新娘。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Enzai makes a plea to Dr Jin to operate on his father but the latter rejected. Enzai decides to operate on his father personally. The team members are willing to give her a helping hand. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在拜托金道勋医生替父亲做手术，但金医生以病患太多为由推辞. 恩在最终决定亲自为爸爸动刀，此消息传遍医疗船，大家都表示愿意帮忙。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 19
programme.desc: Zhi-an does not dare to tell Mingxi the truth about her identity when she witnesses how Mingxi treats those who betray her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安目睹明熙如何残忍地对待出卖她的画廊理事，于是不敢说出美静欺骗海成集团的事。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 20
programme.desc: Photographs of Daojing touring a museum with Zhi-an are uploaded onto the company's intranet. The company staff speculate that Zhi-an was made a permanent staff because she is Daojing's girlfriend. Yanghao orders for Zhi-an's identity to be made public to squash the rumours. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安和道京两人一起到博物馆游览的照片被人上载到公司的网站上，立刻引发热烈的讨论。大家谣传知安是道京的女友才得以顺利当上海成服饰的正职员工。为了杜绝谣言，阳浩下令马上公开知安的身份。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 3
programme.desc: Under the influence of the Belt and Road Initiative in 2016, Sihanoukville has become a hot destination in Cambodia for the Chinese investors. How do the Cambodian people strike balance on the original farming activities, livelihood, education and environmental issues with development and profits? 在2016年一带一路政策的影响下，大量的中资进入柬埔寨，而在濒临海港的西哈努克市，就成了中资们炙手可热的投资胜地。在发展与利润面前，柬埔寨人原本的农耕活动、民生、教育和环境问题，如何取得平衡？.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 4
programme.desc: Eric suspects that Justin had planned to involve him in the ATM hacking case, so he tries to contact him but Justin has cut off contact. Wei Yun finds a Teng Sheng Bank name card in Eric's clothes, and various signs lead her to suspect that Eric is involved in the ATM hacking case. She secretly goes on a yacht that Eric has rented to find clues for her report, but she accidentally encounters Ma Dong Bao, a killer hired by Li Hao...... Eric怀疑Justin设计害他卷入ATM盗领案，尝试联络他，但Justin已完全失联。维芸从Eric的衣服中发现腾升银行的名片，根据种种迹象让她拼凑出Eric涉嫌盗领案。她偷偷溜上Eric租的游艇，想找线索报道，不料遇见李昊派来的杀手马东宝…….

programme.title: 金装律师 Suits - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Kangshuo realises that Han Shantai's DNA matches that found on a bag of drugs located at the crime scene 12 years ago. Inspector Pu thus deliberately creates suspicions and conflict between Han Shantai and Jin Zhenkui, causing Zhenkui to finally come forth with the truth. Zhang Xixian regains freedom. programme.title: 我也可以是韩星 Miss Korea - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) In the new season of Miss Korea, 2 young ladies from totally different cultures and background (one Chinese who lives in Australia & the other Singaporean) will leave the comfort of their homes and embark on a 3 months journey to fulfil a K-Pop dream in Korea... (重)两个来自完全不同文化和生活背景的女生Julia和Jojo为了完成她们的韩星梦,远赴韩国进行3个月的造星训练。在人生地不熟的环境下,两个女生可否能和睦共处? 他们会实现梦想吗? 敬请期待!

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 32
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong lures Xiantai out and arranges some hooligans to beat him up to force him to hand over Mr Huang's phone. However, the hooligans flee one-by-one as they are no match for Xiantai. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)载永为了夺回黄社长的手机，假冒益俊约贤泰见面，然后派人打贤泰。岂料，流氓们根本不是贤泰的对手，个个被他打得落荒而逃。载永气煞。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Dr Jin suddenly appears in the operating theatre just as Enzai was about to operate on her father. He chases her out of the room. Enzai expressed gratitude to him when the operation succeeded. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在打算开始父亲的手术时， 金道勋医生出现在手术室，表示会做这场手术，还把恩在赶出去。手术完成后，恩在大表感激。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 21
programme.desc: Zhi-an tells Daojing that she is not Enshi and pleads with Daojing not to expose the truth just yet. Zhi-an works hard for the upcoming 40th anniversary celebrations, hopping that Zaicheng and Mingxi will let the Xus off lightly later on in consideration of the effort she has put in at work. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安告诉道京她不是真正的恩石，然后拜托道京先不要向载成和明熙说出真相。知安尽全力处理40周年庆的事项，希望真相被揭发时，崔家可以看在她为公司努力的份上，不要太怪罪太修和美静。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 22
programme.desc: Zhi-an panics when she hears that Zhitai is about to get married as she knows that the Cuis will punish everyone related to Taixiu and Meijing once they know about Meijing's lie. Not only will Zhitai lose his job, his wedding may also be wrecked once the truth is exposed. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安听说知泰即将结婚，于是拜托道京帮她守住她的秘密。知安清楚地知道一旦真相被揭发，崔家会惩罚徐家的每一个人。到时，知泰的工作将不保，而美静欺骗海成集团的事还可能会导致秀雅悔婚。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 2 Hello Taiwan S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: This programme takes a look at some of Taiwan's famous eateries and dishes. Most importantly, the programme also reveals the moving story behind its success. 介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 5
programme.desc: The engine on the yacht breaks down and it stops moving. Eric and Wei Yun are stranded in the sea, and they get to know each other better. Eric divulges to her that he is in conflict with the director at Teng Sheng Bank, and that his director would gladly make him the scapegoat for the incident. He tells her that he will find evidence by himself and use it to negotiate with the police. (PG)游艇因机械故障失去动力，Eric和维芸受困海上，彼此有了进一步认识。Eric透露他跟腾升银行主管有矛盾，对方巴不得让他背黑锅。他表示自己会找到证据，再去跟警方谈判。游艇恢复动力得以靠港，Eric却看见马东宝守在码头…….

programme.title: 进击的台湾 2 Hello Taiwan S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) This programme takes a look at some of Taiwan's famous eateries and dishes. Most importantly, the programme also reveals the moving story behind its success. (重)介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 2 Hello Taiwan S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) This programme takes a look at some of Taiwan's famous eateries and dishes. Most importantly, the programme also reveals the moving story behind its success. (重)介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Zhi-an tells Daojing that she is not Enshi and pleads with Daojing not to expose the truth just yet. Zhi-an works hard for the upcoming 40th anniversary celebrations, hopping that Zaicheng and Mingxi will let the Xus off lightly later on in consideration of the effort she has put in at work. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)知安告诉道京她不是真正的恩石，然后拜托道京先不要向载成和明熙说出真相。知安尽全力处理40周年庆的事项，希望真相被揭发时，崔家可以看在她为公司努力的份上，不要太怪罪太修和美静。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Zhi-an panics when she hears that Zhitai is about to get married as she knows that the Cuis will punish everyone related to Taixiu and Meijing once they know about Meijing's lie. Not only will Zhitai lose his job, his wedding may also be wrecked once the truth is exposed. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)知安听说知泰即将结婚，于是拜托道京帮她守住她的秘密。知安清楚地知道一旦真相被揭发，崔家会惩罚徐家的每一个人。到时，知泰的工作将不保，而美静欺骗海成集团的事还可能会导致秀雅悔婚。.

programme.title: 最强大脑 第四季 The Brain China S4 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) The Brain is a talent show that celebrates gifted minds and incredible skills of extraordinary men, women, and children. In Season 4, the programme aims to disseminate scientific knowledge to more viewers, especially the youths. Tune in as popular artistes take up different challenges in each episode. (重)《最强大脑》是一个大型科学类脑力真人秀节目。第四季主打“让科学在年轻人中流行起来”，以青春为科学站台，向年轻人传播科学的重要性，并请来年轻人喜欢的青春偶像参加挑战。.

programme.title: 大飨宴 The Banquet - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) An info series featuring cultural celebrations in various parts of the world. The programme will feature the highlight of the celebrations; "The Banquet". (重)《大飨宴》在每一集里呈现不一样的节庆或食会 - 全部8个海外地点的8大飨宴。节目将从整个设宴地点和宴会背景说起，进而聚焦各个人物以及宴会上的特别菜肴。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) After finding Mei Ling, she reveals that she met Kloudiia in church. Kloudiia had turned to the church to help cope with her grief of losing An Ran and the reason for Kloudiia's suicide attempt triggered Kai Xiang's memories to flood back in. While Kai Xiang was preparing for his wedding, An Ran had a terrible accident that left him fighting for his life. At a loss of what to do, Kloudiia begged Kai Xiang to return to Moscow to see his son. (PG)(重)美玲是Kloudiia在教会认识的好友，在她初遇Kloudiia时，Kloudiia正处于崩溃的边缘。是她一直陪伴Kloudiia，帮她走出人生低谷。原来Kloudiia还活着，不过孩子已经不在了！当时Kloudiia是因为突如其来的丧子之痛才崩溃选择自杀。Kloudiia自杀丧子的真相，刺激了凯翔，也揭开了他逃婚的谜底。原来凯翔和筱琦筹备婚礼时，安然却遇上严重意外，危在旦夕。慌张失措的Kloudiia 恳求凯翔到莫斯科一趟，见他们的孩子安然最后一面。.

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. (重)幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 3
programme.desc: Under the influence of the Belt and Road Initiative in 2016, Sihanoukville has become a hot destination in Cambodia for the Chinese investors. How do the Cambodian people strike balance on the original farming activities, livelihood, education and environmental issues with development and profits? 在2016年一带一路政策的影响下，大量的中资进入柬埔寨，而在濒临海港的西哈努克市，就成了中资们炙手可热的投资胜地。在发展与利润面前，柬埔寨人原本的农耕活动、民生、教育和环境问题，如何取得平衡？.

programme.title: 美食攻略 Big Food - EP 9
programme.desc: Less than fifty years ago there were barely a dozen Japanese restaurants in Singapore but today there are more than six hundred. The kitchen at Japan Food Holdings supplies 45 Japanese restaurants. They make 27,000 bowls of ramen and 10,000 servings of noodles every day. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 7
programme.desc: Ep 7: The company releases the list of staff who are said to have resigned voluntarily. Wancai does not want to lose his job. He makes a scene at the roof of the office building and almost falls from height. The video of the incident goes viral on the Internet and is also reported in the news. Ep 7: 公司公布名誉退休申请者名单，一切已成定局。万才始终不肯面对现实，到公司顶楼哭闹，险些从高楼跌下，事发经过被公司职员拍下后在网络疯传，还被电视新闻报道。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 8
programme.desc: Ep 8: Wancai's near-death protest at the company is widely reported by the media, causing the company's reputation and share prices to suffer. Wancai's supervisor thus agrees to allow him to continue to work till retirement age. Ep 8: 万才在屋顶示威一事被媒体报道后令公司被大众指指点点，还导致股价下滑。专务担心若真的逼万才名誉退休，将有更多负面新闻，于是答应让万才工作到退休年龄。万才感激。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 12
programme.desc: Taiqing successfully distracts Daochen and helps Zhekui make his way to the press conference. Baoyuan reports to Taiqing that she suspects Ciying had hacked into the security system when Zhekui was killed, but Taiqing doesn't believe her. 泰庆偷梁换柱让自己成为诱饵，让道辰上当,成功让哲奎进入记者招待会。宝媛向泰庆报告在哲奎遇害时，看到次英行踪可疑,怀疑她入侵了保安系统，但泰庆却不信她的话。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 13
programme.desc: Ep 13Taiqing is accused of killing Zhekui. The President helps Taiqing to sneak into Caixin Group. Baoyuan successfully enters Daochen's office with Taiqing's instruction. Meanwhile, Taiqing sees Ciying on his surveillance screen... Ep 14Taiqing's trust towards Ciying has wavered. Taiqing and Baoyuan suspect that something more drastic is going to happen. They decide to carry out investigations Ciying and Zhekui. The President decides to meet Special Prosecutor Cui with the USB drive at Ep 13泰庆被陷害是暗杀哲奎的凶手。总统配合泰庆，支开道辰以让他潜入财信集团。宝媛在泰庆的指挥下成功进入道辰的办公室，泰庆却在监控画面上看到了次英的身影。。。。。。 Ep 14泰庆对次英的信任产生了动摇。泰庆与宝媛意识到会有更大的事件发生，于是计划分头调查次英与哲奎。总统本要带着USB随身盘寻找崔特检，却临时将目的地更改为财信集团。.

programme.title: 无限歌谣季 Unlimited Song Season - EP 13
programme.desc: A variety show that allows the professional singer songwriters to collaborate with non professionals who were deemed to have potential to excel in the music industry. 该节目以音乐节为形式，让专业音乐人化身“无限唱作人"和非专业的“歌谣研修生"搭档创作新音乐.

programme.title: 走近科学 Approaching Science Sr 9 - EP 13
programme.desc: Brace yourself for another season of exciting subjects and intriguing discoveries in the new "Approaching Science". 季明为了用中国本土咖啡豆打造出一杯世界级精品咖啡，他四处寻找，终于在云南朱苦拉找到了一款中国最古老的咖啡豆。咖啡对人体健康又有怎样的影响？海南福山，许多百岁老人都有喝咖啡的习惯，咖啡对他们的长寿起到重要作用。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 3
programme.desc: Shengzhu is afraid to go home and sleep alone after witnessing the murder at her home. She worries that the murderer will come back and kill her. A crazy idea strikes her: get a contract husband, provide the money he demands in exchange for the sense of security she needs. She thinks of Zuodou who lives in her mountain property and decides to look for him for a deal... 胜珠自从在家目击了杀人案，因恐惧不敢回家，不敢一个人睡觉，担心凶手再来杀害她。她萌生了一个疯狂的想法：找个契约老公，给他所需要的金钱，而自己得到想要的安全感。她想起了隐居在她山中的作斗，决定去找他做个交易。。。。。。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 4
programme.desc: Eric Zhao is frustrated after several failed attempts to locate the grandson of the legendary master of gayageum, Wu He. Jingshu cannot believe it when she sees the news that Shengzhu is getting married through her social media. She contacts Shimi immediately. Shimi recalls that Shengzhu has made mention of buying a husband and gets worried. He and Jingshu looks for Shengzhu together. 艾瑞克赵一直找不着伽耶琴名匠的孙子吴赫，令他十分生气。景淑在胜珠的社群媒体看到胜珠结婚的消息，不敢相信她结婚了，于是立刻联络世弥。世弥想起了胜珠曾说过想用钱买老公的事，感到担心，便与景淑去找胜珠。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight - EP 29

programme.title: 信号 Signal - EP 13
programme.desc: Ep 17Zhishou decides to tell Haiying the truth about the Renzhou high school rape case and asks Haiying to meet him in front of the Renzhou Hospital. However, he is dead by the time Haiying arrives. Xiuxian is shocked and saddened after learning that Caihan was killed by Zhishou many years ago.Ep 18With the clue Zhishou gave before his death, Haiying and Xiuxian go to Jin Chengfan's mother's house where she dug out a set of skeletons and an identity pass belonging to detective Li Caihan. Ep 17治守打电话给海英要告诉他当年仁州女高中生案件的真相，约了他在仁州医院前见面。可是当海英到达时，发现治守已遭人杀害。当秀贤得知治守当年亲手杀了材韩一事后，感到十分惊讶和难过。Ep 18海英想起治守临终前留给他有关李材韩刑警的线索，于是与秀贤到金成范母亲名下的房子寻找，并在石台阶地下挖出了一具尸骨，旁边还有一个李材韩刑警的工作牌。。。。。。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 Sound Of My Dream S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Sound Of My Dream is a music program which invites Chinese pop singers to challenge musicians and other singers to pit their skills. Mentors and singers put in their best to show the essence of music, regardless of the outcome. (重)《梦想的声音》（原《声音的战争》）是一档由浙江卫视所打造的音乐节目，邀请到华语乐坛歌手面对面进行“歌艺过招”，导师与素人歌手抛开所有包袱，毫无保留的相互讨教，竭尽所能展现出音乐本质。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 8
programme.desc: In the hidden depths of our Singapore flats and houses, there are few individuals with secret collections that will astound you. Meet a man with a million-dollar doll collection, that even his girlfriend feels threatened by. Peifen also investigates the rumour of 500 pigs hidden in a HDB apartment, and a secret military stash. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 1
programme.desc: Literature often contains a rich archive of culture and history. Shanghainese cuisine has become integral to the city's culture. Host Danny Yeo explores renowned Shanghainese writer Zhang Ailing's novels, and discovers the old city's legacy and traditional flavours. 文学是文化的保存，历史的记载。上海美食从古流传至今，已经不再纯粹是为了填饱肚子的粮食, 它也成了上海的印记。这一集，主持人杨君伟将遵循上海女作家张爱玲细腻的笔触，用书中的美食去感受旧上海的繁华，体验人生百味。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 4
programme.desc: Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 3
programme.desc: Two years after a catastrophic earthquake struck Nepal, there are many who continue to live with the repercussions of the seismic disaster. Homes have not been fully rebuilt leaving victims without shelter, and schools are still in the process of being repaired. Host Paul Foster hooks up with his Nepalese friends to undertake a tough, dangerous and exhilarating 14 hour drive up the mountains in a special delivery of masonry that will help rebuild schools. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 3
programme.desc: In this episode, Bjorn meets the driving forces behind Mr Popiah and Health Food Matters, the people who are innovating their food products, all for a specific but growing group of consumers. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 9
programme.desc: Ep 9: ONE's Food wins in the contest against the hospital canteen. Yiyuan takes the chance to humiliate the canteen staff. Yuzhen reprimands Yiyuan for being too condescending. He even says that it's right for him to end their relationship because Yiyuan has become too complacent for his liking. Ep 9: ONE’s食品在对决中胜出。艺苑趁机羞辱餐厅员工一番。宇真在旁听到，指艺苑没有人情味，像她妈妈一样可怕，还说离开她是正确的。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 10
programme.desc: Ep 10: The media reports that Yiyuan is two-timing Yuzhen and Shengxian. Yuzhen rushes to Yiyuan's side when he's worried that she will be affected. To Yuzhen's surprise however, Yiyuan admits that she's the mastermind behind the reports. Her aim is to get Shengxian to break off their engagement. Ep 10: 艺苑和宇真一起出外被偷拍，艺苑被媒体指脚踏两条船。宇真担心艺苑受影响，匆忙地赶到艺苑身边，岂料，艺苑却说报道是她策划的，目的就是要未婚夫放弃跟她结婚。.

programme.desc: Ep 13Taiqing is accused of killing Zhekui. The President helps Taiqing to sneak into Caixin Group. Baoyuan successfully enters Daochen's office with Taiqing's instruction. Meanwhile, Taiqing sees Ciying on his surveillance screen... Ep 14Taiqing's trust towards Ciying has wavered. Taiqing and Baoyuan suspect that something more drastic is going to happen. They decide to carry out investigations Ciying and Zhekui. The President decides to meet Special Prosecutor Cui with the USB drive at Ep 13泰庆被陷害是暗杀哲奎的凶手。总统配合泰庆，支开道辰以让他潜入财信集团。宝媛在泰庆的指挥下成功进入道辰的办公室，泰庆却在监控画面上看到了次英的身影。。。。。。 Ep 14泰庆对次英的信任产生了动摇。泰庆与宝媛意识到会有更大的事件发生，于是计划分头调查次英与哲奎。总统本要带着USB随身盘寻找崔特检，却临时将目的地更改为财信集团。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 14
programme.desc: Ep 15The President negotiates with Daochen to delay his impeachment as well as to put an end to the investigation of Taiqing. Nobody attends the state conference held by the President but Taiqing chooses to believe in the President. He works with Baoyuan to investigate Caixin Group's conspiracy. Ep 16Taiqing requests for a reinstatement of his duties in order to escort the President to his meeting with Daochen. Meanwhile, Baoyuan is in danger when she visits Ciying at the hospital. Ep 15 总统与道辰协议弹劾延期，并要求其中断对泰庆的调查。总统举办的国务会议竟无人出席，但泰庆听了总统的自白后，决定相信他，并与宝媛携手调查财信集团的阴谋。 Ep 16 泰庆不放心总统与道辰会面，主动要求复职与其同行，而此时去医院探望次英的宝媛再次陷入危险。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 5
programme.desc: Shengzhu quarrels with director Eric Zhao as he is blocking the way at a carpark. Eventually Shengzhu helps Eric parkhis car elegantly. This leaves a deep impression on Eric. Zuodou finds out from his nanny that Enzhao looked for him in the mountains. He decides to go to Enzhao's performance. programme.desc: Aisyah has set her eyes on Irfan even though she knows he is married. She tries ways to be closer to him. Meanwhile, Airel is having trouble letting go of Maisarah. He is unable to accept the fact that Maisarah is married to Irfan, the one person whom she has previously declared many times that they were nothing more than just childhood friends.

programme.title: Jom Jalan - EP 11
programme.desc: This travelogue series brings celebrities all over the country. Every week, a different celebrity will bring you around to exciting destinations which include vacation locations, historical sites, shopping and local foods. The episode will also end off with a musical performance by the featured artiste. In this episode, join Zarul Husin in Johor Bahru,.

programme.title: Detik - EP 17
programme.desc: The half hour program analyses and dissect issues of concern to the Malay-Muslim Singaporeans - be it at the community level, national, regional or global. Apart from raising awareness, each DETIK episode hopes to set viewers thinking and make informed decisions on matters that can impact their lives.

programme.title: Berita - EP 153
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Menantu International - EP 3
programme.desc: Firman brings home an unwanted surprise, causing a drift between him and his usually doting mum. Mel realizes that Bryan is not intending to have a child when she herself plans to have at least 2. Bryan does not want to 'split' the love and time with his daughter from the first marriage.

programme.title: Kelas Kekek - EP 6
programme.desc: In this week's episode, Kelas Kekek's sketches will focus on the funny antics of personal grooming. Get fit and healthy with Sachok, Sapau and Chokbak, three men who try to outdo each other during their gym sessions. Also, what will happen when a traditional folklore - Bawang Putih Bawang Merah - is adapted to modern context?

programme.title: Girlfriend Aku Dari Neraka - EP 10
programme.desc: Lydia becomes furious when she finds out that Rudi has been going out with other girls behind her back. To ensure that Rudi stays loyal to her, she makes him promise to update her on his whereabouts.

programme.title: Mencintaimu Mr Photographer - EP 6
programme.desc: As good friends, Dato Roslan and Tan Sri Megat want to keep their promise to marry their children. While Nazrul is delighted to see Aira as his matchmade partner, Dato Roslan's wife, Datin Laila is furious with this arrangement and wants the wedding to be cancelled.

programme.title: Jihan Show - EP 10
programme.desc: Jihan Show is a series featuring Malaysia's famous comedian, Jihan Musa. Featuring Amy Mastura, Zara Zya, Syuk and her weekly guest artistes, the Jihan Show promises to be full of fun and laughter as the group casually discuss on current issues and the battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Jom Kahwin - EP 12
programme.desc: Adam, the eldest of four children, runs a farm in a kampung while simultaneously fending for his brothers who have all left school to help out on the farm. Having grown up with the animals, these three young men, Chad, Baim and Daniel, aren't the most well-mannered. To switch things up and bring change to the farm, Adam decides to venture into the city and scout for a potential bride who can also serve as an 'elder sister' for his brothers and become the 'ideal' housewife, whatever the latter means.

programme.title: AH...! - EP 4
programme.desc: There are so many differences between men and women. However, is it true that women love to share about their love lives with their friends while men keep their feelings private among theirs? We find out why women are more open to talking about their feelings, while men prefer to keep it to themselves.

programme.title: Hero Seorang Cinderella - EP 14
programme.desc: Nura Medina lives with her stepmother, Datin Mawar and her stepsister, Puteri after her father, Datuk Azizan, remarries. Her relationship with her father becomes distant when her stepmother consistently directs her hatred towards her every day. Datin Mawar secretly conspires with Puteri to destroy Medina and get rid of her.

programme.title: Seribu Rindu - EP 7
programme.desc: Aisyah has set her eyes on Irfan even though she knows he is married. She tries ways to be closer to him. Meanwhile, Airel is having trouble letting go of Maisarah. He is unable to accept the fact that Maisarah is married to Irfan, the one person whom she has previously declared many times that they were nothing more than just childhood friends.

programme.title: Kawanku...Oh Yeah! 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Felisha starts using social media to promote her slime. As her number of followers grow, she becomes more ambitious and unknowingly misuses the platform. When Aiyah plays the violin badly, Felisha takes a video of her and posts on social media, causing a rift between her and Aliyah.

programme.title: Girls Only - EP 10
programme.desc: Join Ain Edruce as she educates you about make-up, fashion and beauty tips and more in the many different segments of Girls Only.

programme.title: Aziz Istanbul - EP 15
programme.desc: Glorious Istanbul shows Istanbul in all its glory from its oldest streets, alleyways to soaring minarets, thousands of hours of shooting speaks volumes about the historical capital city that is the Glorious Istanbul. The series will feature 26 interesting places in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Mancing Liar - EP 3
programme.desc: Mancing Liar is a documentary program about the fishing world, especially sport fishing. Sport fishing focuses more on physical activity, which is obtained by a strike with a monster fish. Nevertheless, the main purpose of sport fishing is to exercise instead of collecting as much fish as possible.

programme.title: Berita - EP 154
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

A special guest will be invited every week to join in on these funny skits!

programme.title: Seribu Rindu - EP 8
programme.desc: Irfan and Jo eagerly prepare for the launch of their restaurant in Kuala Lumpur. Maisarah is delighted as she wishes for her husband to be closer to her. Just when Irfan is happy that everything is going his way, Maisarah suddenly faints and is quickly rushed to the clinic.

programme.title: Aroma Tradisi - EP 4
programme.desc: Chef Fikree travels around Malaysia to learn about the various popular local delicacies and dishes. He will be assisted with an invited guest and visit food factories to learn how the food is prepared or processed.

programme.title: Rahsia Singapura 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Rahsia Singapura is an investigative-style travelogue, where our roving detective host digs for clues and snoops for hush-hush places and people here.
